rule.name: PR_prItemRowEach
rule.definition: with( local!item: ri!prItems[ri!index], local!IS_APPROVAL_STEP: ri!step="APPROVAL", local!IS_REVIEW_STEP: ri!step="REVIEW", #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridRowLayout"( id: ri!index, contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Summary", readOnly: local!IS_APPROVAL_STEP, disabled: local!item.decision="Approve", required: true, value: local!item.summary, saveInto: local!item.summary ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"( label: "Quantity", align: "RIGHT", readOnly: local!IS_APPROVAL_STEP, disabled: local!item.decision="Approve", required: true, validations: if(local!item.qty < 0, "Quantity must be greater than 0", ""), value: local!item.qty, saveInto: local!item.qty ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"( label: "Unit Price", align: "RIGHT", readOnly: local!IS_APPROVAL_STEP, ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Amount", align: "RIGHT", readOnly: true, value: if(or(isnull(local!item.unitPrice), isnull(local!item.qty)), null, dollar(local!item.qty*local!item.unitPrice) ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Due", align: "RIGHT", readOnly: local!IS_APPROVAL_STEP, disabled: local!item.decision="Approve", validations: if(local!item.neededBy < today(), "Due date can't be in the past", ""), value: local!item.neededBy, saveInto: local!item.neededBy ), if(local!IS_APPROVAL_STEP, { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Account", value: local!item.account, readOnly: true() ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Project", value: local!item.project, readOnly: true() ) }, { with( local!accountChoices: {"General", "Cloud and Community Services", "Marketing", "Professional Services", "Sales", "Other"}, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Account", placeholderLabel: "---Select---", choiceLabels: local!accountChoices, choiceValues: if(local!item.account="Other", {}, local!item.accountOther << #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_returnFirst"(null, _) ) } ) ), with( local!projectChoices: { local!item.account & ": Project A", local!item.account & ": Project B", local!item.account & ": Project C" }, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Project", placeholderLabel: "---Select---", choiceLabels: local!projectChoices, choiceValues: local!projectChoices, disabled: or(isnull(local!item.account), local!item.account="Other", local!item.decision="Approve"), required: local!item.account<>"Other", value: local!item.project, saveInto: local!item.project ) ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Other", readOnly: local!IS_APPROVAL_STEP, disabled: or(isnull(local!item.account), local!item.account<>"Other", local!item.decision="Approve"), required: local!item.account="Other", value: local!item.accountOther, saveInto: local!item.accountOther ), if(not(or(local!IS_APPROVAL_STEP, local!IS_REVIEW_STEP)), {}, { if(local!IS_REVIEW_STEP, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Decision", readOnly: true, value: local!item.decision ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Decision", required: true, choiceLabels: {"Approve", "Reject", "Need More Info"}, choiceValues: {"Approve", "Reject", "Need More Info"}, placeholderLabel: "---Select---", value: local!item.decision, saveInto: local!item.decision ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Reason", required: or(local!item.decision="Reject", local!item.decision="Need More Info"), requiredMessage: "Provide a reason when this item is not approved", readOnly: local!IS_REVIEW_STEP, value: local!item.decisionReason, saveInto: local!item.decisionReason ) }), if( local!IS_APPROVAL_STEP, {}, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"( label: "Remove", align: "CENTER", links: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"( label: char(10005), value: ri!index, /*TODO: update this to be the array index*/ saveInto: ri!prItems << remove(ri!prItems, _) ) ) ) } ) )
